prompt: Create a notification page with interactive swipe actions and modern gestures. Design a clean interface with 'Notifications' header and implement swipeable notification items that reveal action buttons when swiped left or right. Each notification should display user avatars, message content, timestamps, and provide swipe-to-dismiss functionality. Include visual feedback for swipe actions with colored backgrounds that appear during the swipe gesture. Use Material Design principles with appropriate animations and ensure the swipe actions feel responsive and intuitive for mobile interaction patterns.
